# fees

Fees on a certain date of top crypto protocols

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/fees [date]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| date | Date to get fees for (e.g., 2021-01-01) (default: today) | True | None |


---

## Examples

```
/fees date: 2023-04-19
```

---
